# Passage (Staff)
## Overview
**Aura** strong varied; **CL** 17th

**Slot** none

**Price** 206,900 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

This potent item allows use of the following spells:

- *[[Dimension Door (Spell)|Dimension door]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Passwall (Spell)|Passwall]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Teleport, Greater (Spell)|Greater teleport]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Phase Door (Spell)|Phase door]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Astral Projection (Spell)|Astral projection]]* (2 charges)

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Staff (Feat)|Craft Staff]], *[[Astral Projection (Spell)|astral projection]], [[Dimension Door (Spell)|dimension door]], [[Teleport, Greater (Spell)|greater teleport]], [[Passwall (Spell)|passwall]], [[Phase Door (Spell)|phase door]]*

**Cost** 115,950 gp 

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 495
